item.description:
Hello Gamers.. My name is Mikal Dmon,
and I would like to welcome four people to
a New Game Night I'm starting next month,
based on H.P Lovecraft's horror-fiction classic
Call of Cthulhu ..

This is a percentile skill-based system, published by Chaosium, based on Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos
(BRP)These are story-based campaigns, that are mostly original, tweaked in my own fashion, and times-lines are usually current days..

For those who are seriously interested, please apply as usual, or email/phone for more details.. Drinks, and Snacks will also be provided...Easy commute form T.

See you soon..
Take care M.Dmon
item.name: New Game-Night: Call of Cthulhu
